intro: Spermacoce vegeta, commonly known as the common moonseed, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is a herbaceous annual that typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant produces small, white or yellowish flowers that are clustered in umbels. Its fruit is a capsule that splits open to release tiny seeds. Spermacoce vegeta is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and its ability to thrive in disturbed soils.
